title: Which book should I prefer for understanding the basics of packaging? - Quora

response.answer_text: Over 200 Innovative Solutions in Packaging Design By John Foster: Packaging is a core design topic with constantly changing trends. For Sale showcases packaging designs from 50 top firms. 15 firms are showcased with several spreads of work samples and an in-depth interview to capture their creative process and best advice. Profiles include noted packaging designers Wink, Sub Pop, Werner Design Werks, Starbucks, Modern Dog, Turner Duckworth, Art Chantry, Fossil, Invisible Creature and more.

Packaging being an applied science involves various other fields such as Plastic, Glass, Paper, Metal and others. It is difficult to cover all the topics in one book. There are lot of book which are good in Packaging but cover all the sciences differently. But recently i saw one book which i read and i can suggest you: The Big Book of Packaging: Science, Art & Technology
